args.new_str:
67    directions = {}
    68    for layer in hidden_layers:
    69        h = hidden_states[layer]
    70        h_centered = recenter(h)
    71        self.H_train_means[layer] = torch.mean(torch.Tensor(h), axis=0).cpu().numpy()
    72        pca = PCA(n_components=self.n_components)
    73        pca.fit(h_centered.cpu().numpy())
    74        directions[layer] = pca.components_
    75    return directions
